column2: Add option 'ignore != 0' to inspection 'Conditional expression with negated condition

column3: Hi @rillig, is there a YouTrack request open for this? If not, could you create one?

Is there a better way for testing different options of one inspection? I'd rather have liked a method doTest(inspection) instead, but currently both calls to getInspection are during the setup phase of the test, and I also didn't find a hook for modifying the inspection before actually applying it.

Thanks for your efforts, merged manually as d001216
For next time: please squash all commits into one, this makes merging into our project easier (unfortunately we can't use GitHub's automatic pull request merging).
Thanks again.
Add 'ignore != 0' to inspection for negated conditions (IDEA-202323)
